value:
$WmMPID_ティアマト,ch09_04_Tiamat_F_Normal,Face|$w0|You made your way here, even
knowing the risks. I applaud your
bravery.$k$pThere's just one problem: we can't
afford to lose. You're going down
today—not us.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_Normal,Face|$w0|We lost. But I have no regrets.$k$pYou showed us your strength.
We're not enemies.$k$pSomeday, somewhere...we might just
meet again. I look forward to it.$k$p

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|We did it! Our homeland is saved.
It's time to head back!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Ugh. I'm so tired.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$EFace_Smile|$w0|Alright, $Nu,
let's get—$k$p$Sbs500|$SspSE_EFFECT_DARKBREATH|$Fo500,0,0,0,255|$Fi500|$EFace_Pain|$w0|What was that?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|$w0|No!$k$p$Fo500,0,0,0,255|$Fi500|The gateway, it's closing...
$Nu, hurry!
This way!$k$p$Fo1000,0,0,0,255|$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|$Fi1000|$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_02,0|Hello, Summoner. This time, it's just
you and me. $k$pYour bratty little friends are on the
other side of the gateway. There's no
one to save you now...$k$pI made a promise to you, and I intend
to keep it. It's time to die.$k$pI'll pop your head right off... Just
like I used to do with my dolls.$k$p$SspSE_BATTLE_STING1|$Fo200,255,255,255,255|$Fi200|$EFace_Anger|$w0|Who dares?$k$p$Fo1000,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_ザカリア影,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|$w0|$Fi1000|Run, $Nu!
Toward the light!$k$pJust go! Trust me!
I'm Zacharias—Alfonse and
Sharena's friend!$k$p$SspSE_EFFECT_TENKU|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|Keep going! You're almost there!$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo1000,255,255,255,255|$Fi1000|$Nu!
You'd better watch out for
Alfonse and the others!$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_IMPACT|$Sbs3000|$Fo3000,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|$Fi3000|$Nu!$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_03,0|$EFace_Smile|There you are.
Am I glad to see you!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|Oh, $Nu!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|When I saw you disappear just like
Zacharias did, I thought my chest
would burst.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Me too. I'm so glad you're safe.
Seriously, don't do that.
$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|What? You say that Zacharias saved
you? What are you talking about?
How...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|$w0|Let's talk later! We have to get out
of here before they close the gateway
on us again!$k$p$Sbs150|
